name: Golf Skies
summary: Golf Skies is a delightful 2D golf game with smooth gameplay and lots of fun twists - You play golf up in the sky where the course is made out of mini planets with their own gravitational fields and obstacles. There's another innovative mechanic too, right after you shoot the ball you are able to steer it and race all the way to the green for a hole in one - as long as you have stamina left!
